title: Test
yAxis: Income/ loss in million U.S. dollars
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Income/ loss in million U.S. dollars, with a total of 5 data points.
Overall Income/ loss in million U.S. dollars has increased over the Year
Income/ loss in million U.S. dollars is rapidly increasing from 2015 to 2017, rapidly decreasing from 2017 to 2018, and lastly roughly constant from 2018 to 2019.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2016 and 2017.
Max Income/ loss in million U.S. dollars about 3445.07 was recorded at Year 2017
Min Income/ loss in million U.S. dollars about 372.89 was recorded at Year 2015
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Income/ loss in million U.S. dollars, with a total of 5 data points. The chart has 2 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2017 to 2019.
Differently, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2015 to 2017.
